description: This file sets up the application configuration for an Angular project, defining providers such as zone change detection, routing, and HTTP client with interceptors.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular to optimize zone change detection with event coalescing.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up Angular's router with given routes.

methods.name: provideHttpClient
methods.description: Configures Angular's HTTP client with optional interceptors.

methods.name: withInterceptors
methods.description: Wraps HTTP interceptors for use with Angular's HTTP client.
